RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 54. Claiming Purse 17100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERENDIPITOUS stalked the pace three then four wide into the turn, rallied to make the lead past the furlong marker and finished full of run under a strong hand ride to win going away. TAMMY'S TOY never far back, rallied along the inside through the turn to make the lead near the quarter pole, maintained his advantage until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. THANKSDAD close up from the start, swung wide and went evenly. TEQUILA FLATS failed to menace. PLAYING BALL dueled in the two path for a half then gave way. WHO CAN WIN pressed the pace two then three wide into the turn, checked nearing the quarter pole and dropped out of it. DAVIS HAT trailed. THE RIDER OF WHO CAN WIN LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE ON THE TURN. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Tammy's Toy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied inside, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Who Can Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2-3wide, checked 1/4 pole, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Serendipitous
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3-4wide, full of run, going away, hand ride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStar Farm, LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAYWING sprinted to the lead before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the stretch then responded under left handed urging to draw off in the final furlong. WELLMAN had speed from the start, dug in three wide and gamely gained second. CENTSOFWANDER never far back, finished with good courage between horses two wide. CINDY'S STORM led early, prompted the pace along the inside into the stretch and faded late. BAD LITTLE BEAST wide early, failed to menace. ATLANTIC FIRESTORM was restless in the gate, settled within striking distance in the four path then lacked the needed response. SHARKS COVE raced wide early and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Centsofwander
ENTRY.OWNER: Fisher Teresa K and Fisher James
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, between horses, 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Cindy's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, pressed inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Graywing
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, drew off, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Wellman
ENTRY.OWNER: Brumley, Jerry S. and Reed, Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, gamely gained second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 17. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RECKLESS L J chased the pace into the turn, rallied two wide to make the lead before a half, set the balance of the pace and drew away under left handed urging. JOES A ROCKIN never far back, moved up in the five path into the stretch and finished clear for second. CAPTAIN RILEY unhurried early, closed a gap late along the inside. C K'S LUCKY DUCK trailed into the stretch then had a mild rally late three wide. THE MAN CAN passed tiring rivals two wide. ONE CRAZY RIDE failed to menace. JUST CHESTER bumped at the start, settled mid pack then lacked the needed response. NAMBITI offered a mild bid four wide on the turn then came up empty. WEST LEONARD was outrun. CADILLAC RIDE away alertly, set the pace for nearly a half then was used up. THIS MAN CAN bumped at the start and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: C K's Lucky Duck
ENTRY.OWNER: Poole Joseph M and McCall Richard H

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed gap late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Joes a Rockin
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, middle move, 5path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Cadillac Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless L J
ENTRY.OWNER: Strain Jeannie and Strain Jr James P
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 2 wide, turn, drew off, left handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Just Chester
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle of pack, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU MAKE ME HAPPY pressed the pace two wide for five sixteenths, made the lead, set the balance of the pace and drew off in the five path through the stretch under brisk handling. SCRATCHOFF vied for the lead along the inside into the turn, shifted out to the six path, improved position before a half and finished clear for second. TONKAWA SPRINGS bumped at the start and went evenly. WICKED CHANCE failed to menace. MO HEAT was no threat. FIRST CROWNED away alertly, set the pace for five sixteenths of a mild, had speed for a half then was used up. PERJURY bumped at the start and was outrun. TRAPPE THE GOLD flashed speed and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Scratchoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, angled out turn, middle move 6path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: First Crowned
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 7/16pole, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: You Make Me Happy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, took over 7/16pole, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pre ferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOUVESAIDITALL stalked the pace for six furlongs, slipped through along the inside to make the lead entering the stretch, battled the balance of the trip and wore down rivals in a game effort. PERFETTO pressed the pace two wide, gained a narrow lead before a half, set the pace into the stretch, gave up the lead to the winner, fought back gamely and just missed. BLAME IT ON EDDIE trailed early and rallied determinedly through the stretch three wide to be narrowly beaten. TIP SHEET never far back, finished with good courage five wide. LUCKY JUNIOR stalked the early pace, loomed boldly four wide into the far turn then was outfinished. IMTHEPRINCE was no factor. ALGORIX raced wide and lacked the needed response. PONT DU GARD broke in front, set the pace for nearly a half then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, got through inside, wore down rivals, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Pont Du Gard
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace nearly half, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, led, fought back gamely, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tip Sheet
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Junior
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 4 wide 2nd turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Eddie
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 3 wide, good effort,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEBULOSA broke in full stride to set all the pace and widened through the stretch under left handed urging to win as much the best. TURNING PAGES never far back, rallied through deep stretch three wide and got up for second. MUCHO PRIMO pressured the winner into the stretch, angled out to the five path and was outfinished for second. COUNTRY RUCKUS close up two wide on the backstretch, dropped inside into the stretch and went evenly. THE PINK Z had good early speed along the inside and faded on the turn. VICTORY DIVISION failed to menace. IMA BELIEVER was no factor. DEXQUIRE had brief speed. ZAROSHA broke slowly and was outrun. HEIDI'S SINATRA trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed inside, faded turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Primo
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, angled out 5path, outfinished for second

ENTRY.NAME: Nebulosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Turning Pages
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 3 wide, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 17. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COSMIC TREASURE chased the pace into the stretch, made the lead then widened the balance of the trip under strong handling to win as much the best. CHASING VINNY bumped at the start, stalked the pace into the stretch, dug in inside rivals and got up for second. GET HAMMERED sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set the pace to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. GEH SCHNELL close up along the inside, angled out at the top of the stretch and finished determinedly three wide. PHARAOH'S PROPHECY bumped at the start and failed to menace. GOTSOMEMOJO void of early speed, passed tiring rivals in deep stretch. DETERMINATOR close up along the inside, angled out on the far turn to the four path then came up empty. AMERICAN FLEET was no factor. NOBLE BEHAVIOR well placed three wide, weakened in the lane. GRANDGRAN raced wide and was outrun. LEVANTO (ARG) settled widest and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, angled out upper stretch, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Determinator
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, angled out 2nd turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing Vinny
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked pace, late rally, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmic Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inherited lead top lane, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Get Hammered
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace upper stretch, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 69. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 17 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less NotConsider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUSHI Q broke in front, set all the pace and maintained her advantage under a brisk hand ride. WOLFIE'S PRINCESS never far back, dug in three wide through deep stretch and got up foe second. MOBIL CHIC vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch, altered course four wide in deep stretch giving up some ground and was gaining on the top pair late. LA ROSA chased the winner into the stretch, loomed boldly two wide before the furlong marker then was outfinished. ANGEL WINGS failed to menace. LUCKY PENNY ROSE trailed early, moved up along the rail into the stretch then leveled off. SPICE ICE was no factor. STATE OF GRACE was through after a half. OPHA MAY was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Wolfie's Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, dug in 3 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, altered course 4 wide late, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Sushi Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: La Rosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, loomed boldly 2 wide upper stretch, outfinished
